title: Shop Glitched?
body: Just after patch 5.19, i went into my store and tried to buy the newly discounted runes, when i tried to purchase them they said "item 5335 was not found' i tried going into my profile and champs to purchase viktor, then realised the button which should read purchase was grey and said something like 'champion unavailable' can anyone help please, tried reinstalling launcher and restarting laptop but nothing works, someone please help. PS im on a macbook pro 2015 april model. OSX yosemite.

replies.body: I still can't buy the 2015 World championship icon "This request body did not contain a item_id field." before and after the update. *sigh*
2015 WCS icon seems to be buyable now - just got it

> [{quoted}](name=Proxima Solaris,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fizl4wJE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-30T17:56:37.887+0000)
>
> 2015 WCS icon seems to be buyable now - just got it

not for me :'(
probably client ill have to probably fix it *sigh*

Yes it is glitched for me too.  Riot releases 1000 meaningless and unworthy patches and break everything.

Good JOB RIOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
